entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
